name: AION Free-to-Play: Medium Starter Pack
detailed_description:
How do I redeem DLC in the game?


After purchasing a DLC pack, you will be shown a Steam product key. Log into AION Free-to-Play, visit the AION Shop and then go to 'Get AION Coins'. Click on 'Redeem Coupon' in the window that appears and enter your product key.
You will now find the contents of the DLC in the AION Shop under 'Manage bonuses => Exclusive rewards', where you can transfer them to one of your characters.

AION Free-to-Play: Medium Starter Pack


Many adventures lie ahead of you. But be on your guard as there are countless threats lurking in the world of AION Free-to-Play. The items in this bundle will be of use on your travels and will support you on your way to becoming a legend. Remember: a hero is only as good as their equipment!

Some of the possible items cannot be sold, are not tradeable and not storeable.



1x [AION Club] Gold Pack (30 days)
A Gold Pack that cannot be traded which lifts all restrictions. Lasts for 30 days.

150x [Jakunerk] Nutritious Meal
These serums strengthen you in energy-sapping battles by regenerating your HP and MP.

10x [Jakunerk] Bag of Powerful Scrolls
Off into the adventure! This bundle contains 5 x 3 major scrolls, which will increase some of your values for a short time. Your character class determines which scrolls are in the bag.

10x Recovery Tea - 100% recovery
Refreshing and tasty: this tea fully regenerates your Energy of Repose, helping you to earn more experience points.

5x Transformation Candy Box: Super Baa
A box of 3 Super Baa Transformation Candies for all classes.

1x Storm Kirrin (30 days)
This mount is loyal to you and will carry you through all of Atreia for 30 days – on the ground and in the air!

short_description:
AION Free-to-Play: Medium Starter Pack



  • 1x [AION Club] Gold Pack (30 days)
  • 150x [Jakunerk] Nutritious Meal
  • 10x [Jakunerk] Bag of Powerful Scrolls
  • 10x Recovery Tea - 100% recovery
  • 5x Transformation Candy Box: Super Baa
  • 1x Storm Kirrin (30 days)
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish*, Polish*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista, 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium4 2.8Ghz / AMD Sempron 2800 or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6600 / AMD Radeon X1550 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, Pentium Dual-Core 2.5 GHz / AMD Athlon64 X2 Dual-Core 2.5GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600GT / AMD Radeon 4550 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
